ygData.subject: RE: Hey guys!
ygData.msgSnippet: I got 3 invitations to play AC, from old UO kakis.  After hearing the complaint for lag and bugs,  I dun dare to try.  Maybe u AC testers can provide some
ygData.messageBody:
I got 3 invitations to play AC, from old UO kakis. After hearing the
complaint for lag and bugs, I dun dare to try. Maybe u AC testers can
provide some feedback after giving it a try. Also worry I will get
addicted like UO and EQ.

I'm looking forward for Diablo2, Nox and Neverwinter Nights. These
'session' multi-players RPGs will take up less time, hehe, and more time
for family & friends.

Meanwhile I'm playing Dark Stone, quite a nice game. Now I'm looking for
kakis to play multi-player games in Heat.net or Kaki.

Ziltus

On Thursday, 28 October, 1999 10:26 AM, Entreri [SMTP:drizzt@...]
wrote:
> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>
> Well,I still cant believe ppl actually like AC...haha
>
>
>
>
>
> Regards
> Hevan
> Servant of Mithaniel Marr
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Freddy Cheng <sccheng@...>
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, October 28, 1999 9:27 AM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Hey guys!
>
>
> >From: "Freddy Cheng" <sccheng@...>
> >
> >Hey guys,
> >just letting u guys know if u all interested in coming to AC let me
know...
> >i will be on World Harvestgain! with the name Silverhand Fred...
> >
> >cheers,
> >Fred
> >p/s : at least theres no such thing as camping in AC.

> >> Message: 1
> >> Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 02:36:06 +0800
> >> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> >> Subject: Fw: I have quit Everquest
> >>
> >>
> >> ----- Original Message -----
> >> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> >> Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 17:26
> >> Subject: I have quit Everquest
> >>
> >>
> >> > Hi all,
> >> > Dued to my failure at PoF which got alot of ppl into trouble
> >> (which
> >> > involved dying and losing the major portion of their stuff) and with
> >> little
> >> > else to do (except like camping for stuff, which I have gotten very
> sick
> >> and
> >> > tired of), I have cancelled my account as from today, Oct 26th 1999.
> >Zand,
> >> > please give out the items to the people as I have listed down with
you.
> >> > Especially Weadaenye, whom I'm guilty as hell to got her into a
living
> >> hell.
> >> >
> >> > Please help me tell the follow people of my quiting and hope
to
> >> see
> >> > them again sometime on another game another time and Best wishes to
> >them.
> >> >
> >> > Daedor, Aildiin, Iyenya, Ironbuket, Hoppy, Kitiarra, Stella,
> >> > Saintly, Valadine, Millie, Silph, Lunatictiara, Ader, Fost, Sparrow,
> >> > Demitry, Wlyven, Anima and Nismo/Volk (they are brothers sharing the
> >same
> >> > account).
> >> >
> >> > Everquest was, had been and enjoyable game at the beginning
but
> >> due
> >> > to the way that the game is designed it reminds me more of Evercamp,
> >> > Everbitch etc etc. It has become a torture to enter the "game" each
day
> >> now.
> >> > This incident has at least freed me from Evercrack as some would say
it
> >> is.
> >> > So farewell my fellow guildmates. And may your time in Everquest be
as
> >> your
> >> > first day, with new and exciting adventures each day.
> >> >
> >> > Garren The Broken Paladin.
> >> >
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>

> >> Message: 3
> >> Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 08:11:41 +0800
> >> From: "Zand" <hannibal@...>
> >> Subject: Re: Fw: I have quit Everquest
> >>
> >> Hello Garren,
> >>
> >> A few quick questions.
> >>
> >> 1. Have you acutally cancelled your EQ a/c? So you're absolutely sure
> >you're
> >> not coming back ever?
> >> If that is the case, i will distribute your stuff sooner than 1 week
but
> >> only if you confirm here
> >> that you will absolutely not return anymore.
> >>
> >> 2. You put a Luna on my list and i have only seen a Lunatictiara on
who
> so
> >> far...
> >> is this the same Luna you want to give your Rubicite Helm to? Kindly
> >> confirm..
> >>
> >> 3. Will you be on this mailint list still or are you also going to
cancel
> >> the subscription?
> >>
> >>
> >> I guess that's it for my questions. I wish you'd change your mind
friend
> >but
> >> I understand your
> >> feelings. Perhaps it really takes one real nasty experience to get ppl
> off
> >> EQ even when
> >> they have been thinking about it for awhile. I experienced it when
> camping
> >> Jboots 12 hrs
> >> and then getting "voted" out of the queue by some selfish asses after
i
> >fell
> >> asleep for awhile
> >> despite having done most of the killing and work and having been in
first
> >> position 4 hrs.
> >> I still will have my revenge! Heh...
> >>
> >>
> >> I wish you all the best Garren be it in another MMORPG in future or in
> >real
> >> life.
> >> But most important of all you get to enjoy your REAL life now =)
> >> Not the alternate one we've been wasting time on hehe..Evercrack it
is!
> >>
> >> Best Regards,
> >> Zand
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>
> >>

> >> Err, I was thinking of quiting also, but didnt expect u to quit
earlier
> >> than me. EQ has turn out to be such a zombie-camping-training game
that
> >> eliminated most of the fun provided by the multi-race/class char
> >> development concept.
> >>
> >> To tell the truth, even after I stop playing EQ, I didn't login UO
every
> >> night. But every time I login, there are quite a lot of stuffs I can
do,
> >> other than camping/hunting. Both UO and EQ are not as attractive as
b4,
> >> but it's sad that say EQ has more 'push' factor than UO. I feel more
> sick
> >> when thinking of logging into EQ than UO ;)
> >>
> >> Ziltus
> >>
> >> p/s: Garren shld have sold ya acct in eBay instead of just quit. Who
> >> know, with ya chars, you can earn some money to buy some new PC
stuffs,
> >> hehe.
> >>
